short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Browser extension for the Caption Crawler System

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Caption Crawler is a browser extension that adds captions to images that do not have any. It is intended to be used by screen-reader users. The added captions are retrieved from other web pages containing the same image. When there is more than one available caption, they may be navigated via keyboard commands. This extension is a research project from the Ability Group at Microsoft Research.
